item.title: How I learned 1500 Chinese Characters in a Month - Heisig Method Review
item.description: Table of contents Introduction First encounters with 中文 Great Wall of Characters Learning (Indo-European) Languages When in Rome (do as the Romans do) Cold Hard Data Time Data Character Data The Heisig Method Associations galore Conclusion Introduction Hello dear visitor! Before you stands a very long article in which you’ll find my review and results after spending 31 days with a book called Remembering Simplified Hanzi 1: How Not to Forget the Meaning and Writing of Chinese Characters written by James Heisig and Timothy W.
